unnormalised: Tech Mahindra announced record profits today, led by CEO CP Gurnani's strategic vision. The company's stock price surged by 7% after the announcement, reaching a new high of Rs. 1,500. Analysts attribute the success to Gurnani's focus on digital transformation and client-centric solutions.
normalised: Tech Mahindra announced record profits today, led by C-P Gurnani's strategic vision. The company's stock price surged by seven percent after the announcement, reaching a new high of rupee one thousand five hundred. Analysts attribute the success to Gurnani's focus on digital transformation and client-centric solutions.

unnormalised: Mr. Gurnani, known for his innovative approach, emphasized the importance of employee empowerment and skill development. He highlighted the contributions of his leadership team, including CFO Manoj Bhat and CHRO Harshvendra Soin. The company has invested heavily in training programs, ensuring employees are equipped to meet the evolving demands of the tech industry.
normalised: Mister Gurnani, known for his innovative approach, emphasized the importance of employee empowerment and skill development. He highlighted the contributions of his leadership team, including C-F-O Manoj Bhat and C-H-R-O Harshvendra Soin. The company has invested heavily in training programs, ensuring employees are equipped to meet the evolving demands of the tech industry.

unnormalised: The press release also noted the appointment of Ms. Ruchi Bhatia as the new Head of Marketing. Ms. Bhatia, previously a VP at Infosys, brings a wealth of experience in brand building and customer engagement. Her expertise is expected to further strengthen Tech Mahindra's market position.
normalised: The press release also noted the appointment of Missus Ruchi Bhatia as the new Head of Marketing. Missus Bhatia, previously a V-P at Infosys, brings a wealth of experience in brand building and customer engagement. Her expertise is expected to further strengthen Tech Mahindra's market position.

unnormalised: The company's growth is further propelled by the entrepreneurial spirit of it's Vice Presidents like Mr. Sanjay Kapoor. With all these leaders combined, Tech Mahindra continues to make headlines as a titan in the business.
normalised: The company's growth is further propelled by the entrepreneurial spirit of its Vice Presidents like Mister Sanjay Kapoor. With all these leaders combined, Tech Mahindra continues to make headlines as a titan in the business.
